explanations.machine learning: The paper introduces a topic model (TSITM) that combines Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) with linear regression, which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.unsupervised learning: Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) is an unsupervised learning technique used for topic modeling in the paper.
explanations.regression: The paper uses linear regression to model the impact of topics on the time series data, with topics acting as explanatory variables.
explanations.feature representation: The topics generated by LDA serve as feature representations for the regression model.
explanations.representation learning: The topic modeling process can be seen as a form of representation learning where text data is transformed into meaningful topic representations.
